text:
@TeamPelosi About 8% of US population get the flu each year.
2,275,645 COVID cases = 0.69% of pop
119,923 COVID deaths = 0.04% of pop - AS IN 0%

WHAT HONEST PERSON would claim deaths of 0.04% of population, mostly fragile compromised elderly, is a PANDEMIC??
#COVID__19 #coronavirus #COVID
